column5: I am buying this Garmin, but the dealer said that someone in the Quebec area would have the DVD or SD chip. I am looking for Lac Bay, Lac Winniash in Quebec and Horwood Lake in Ontario. Can anyone help. Doug

Not certain - but does ANYONE make one? I know Garmin only has the Fishing USA ones and Bluechart. FWIW - if you can get it as a CD or DVD is better than a memory card as it will let you load multiple maps. Topo, road, and fishing. I have All the eastern US roads for on road, Ohio Topo and Ohio fishing loaded on a 1 meg card.
